subject: Critical Thinking
title: Truth Tables: Logic Made Visible
description: A fast breakdown of Truth Tables: Logic Made Visible for builders.

hook.text: What if you could see logic? Truth tables turn abstract reasoning into a simple grid anyone can read.

buildup.text: A truth table lists every possible combination of true/false for a set of statements.

discovery.text: 'If it rains, the ground is wet.' The table shows four scenarios and which ones make the statement true.

twist.text: Truth tables revealed that 'if P then Q' is only false when P is true and Q is false. Counterintuitive.

climax.text: Every digital computer runs on truth tables. Logic gates are just truth tables etched in silicon.

punchline.text: Aristotle's logic became your laptop's brain.

quiz.question: When is 'if P then Q' false?
options: When P is true and Q is false
